attributes.action: ban doctors from prescribing homeopathic medicines to patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: homeopathy is completely unsupported by modern science and there is no proof that it helps to treat any illness. some people have died in vain from taking homeopathic medicines instead of scientifically supported medicines. we need to stop patients being given fake medicine over the real thing.
